LanguageData.TKKN_DryDustStorm.label: dry dust storm
LanguageData.TKKN_DryDustStorm.description: high winds and storms whip up dust, reducing visibilty and the accuracy of ranged weapons.
LanguageData.TKKN_DustStorm.label: dust storm
LanguageData.TKKN_DustStorm.description: storms whip up dust, reducing visibilty and the accuracy of ranged weapons.
LanguageData.TKKN_LavaSmoke.label: lava smoke
LanguageData.TKKN_LavaSmoke.description: lava smoke reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons and poisons pawns.
LanguageData.TKKN_Overcast.label: Overcast
LanguageData.TKKN_ThickFog.label: thick fog
LanguageData.TKKN_ThickFog.description: thick fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons.
LanguageData.TKKN_WindStorm.label: wind storm
LanguageData.TKKN_WindStorm.description: A wind storm. High winds and a little rain. Help turbines but tears out plants and hinders shooting.
LanguageData.TKKN_Windy.label: windy
LanguageData.TKKN_Windy.description: A blustery day. High winds help turbines but hinders shooting.
